constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 44 (Tuesday, March 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FOSTER:
H.R. 1685.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H1190]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Expanding Opportunities for Recovery Act of 2021
